abstract: A Democratic senator said on Thursday that he was asking the Justice Department and the Securities and Exchange Commission to investigate stock trading prior to JPMorgan Chase‘s agreement to buy Bear Stearns in a deal engineered by the Federal Reserve.
lead_paragraph: A Democratic senator said on Thursday that he was asking the Justice Department and the Securities and Exchange Commission to investigate stock trading prior to JPMorgan Chase‘s agreement to buy Bear Stearns in a deal engineered by the Federal Reserve.

headline.main: Senator Calls for Probe into Short Selling Ahead of Bear Deal

abstract: Bear Stearns, the troubled investment bank being acquired by JPMorgan Chase, on Thursday said it expects first-quarter results to be “significantly lower” than a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Bear Stearns, the troubled investment bank being acquired by JPMorgan Chase, on Thursday said it expects first-quarter results to be “significantly lower” than a year earlier.

headline.main: Bear Has No Good Estimate for 1st Quarter Results
